title: Allocation of land at Rajagiriya to the  Excise Department of Sri Lanka
decision_details: - the proposal made by H.E. the President, in his capacity as the Minister of Defence and Urban Development, to allocate a block of land 30.26 perches in extent at Rajagiriya Town, owned by the Urban Development Authority, to the Excise Department, through the Commissioner General of Lands, for the construction of its Head Office building, was approved by the Cabinet.
